description:
Showcase of a Custom On-Demand-Validator executed in the cluster.

It will check that the entered value is greater than the current server timestamp when the user initiates the on-demand validation.

For the Java implementation check out [ExampleOnDemandValidatorSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExampleOnDemandValidatorSchema.java)

start.description: A timestamp. It has to be after the current server time when checking the on-demand validator.
